doc:
Estelle Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estelle_Evans 0 Estelle Rolle Evans (October 1, 1906 – July 20, 1985) was a Bahamian American actress during the 20th century. Some of her most famous appearances were in the movies The Quiet One (1948), To Kill a Mockingbird (1962), and The Learning Tree (1969). Evans was the sister of actresses Rosanna Carter and Esther Rolle. Estelle_Rolle_Evans ( October_1_,_1906 – July_20_,_1985 ) was a_Bahamian_American_actress during the_20th_century . Some of her most_famous_appearances were in the_movies The_Quiet_One_(_1948_) , To_Kill a_Mockingbird_(_1962_) , and The_Learning_Tree_(_1969_) . Evans was the_sister of actresses_Rosanna_Carter and Esther_Rolle .
